thread.section_title: Innside New York Nomad - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Loved it!
thread.title_full: Loved it! - Review of Innside New York Nomad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mike M
title: Loved it!
text:
Great boutique style hotel in a wonderful location. Awesome vibe with calming chill music wafting through the lobby and lifts.
Loved the staff at the front desk, always so welcoming regardless of time of day and the exclusive shower products were amazing (I bought some from their small "shop" area).
Easy walk to almost all areas with access to all conveniences on every corner close by plus subway.
Rooms were adequate in size, stayed in a deluxe city king view room.
More space for luggage would have topped it off. Restaurant dinner was pricey but decent.
Nice to stay in a fresh, modern and trendy hotel at a great price for NYC.
